item.title: The Weird Benefits of Covering Yourself in Ants - Animalist News
item.description: Birds will sit on top of an anthill and let hundreds of ants crawl all over them, for fun... Some will even chew up an anthill and then spread the squashed ant carcasses like butter on their bodies!
item.content:encoded: Birds will sit on top of an anthill and let hundreds of ants crawl all over them, for fun... Some will even chew up an anthill and then spread the squashed ant carcasses like butter on their bodies!
